uiConfig.queryString: Pod != null and 'Log Source' not like '%object%' and 'Log Source' != 'Kubernetes Container Status Logs' | stats count as logrecords by Pod
'Log Source' = 'Kubernetes Event Object Logs' and 'Involved Object Kind' = pod | timestats count as logrecords by 'Involved Object Name'
'Log Source' = 'Kubernetes Pod Object Logs' and 'Pod Phase' = running | stats latest('Pod Phase') as Status by Pod

'Log Source' = 'Kubernetes Pod Object Logs' | stats latest(Namespace) as Namespace, latest('Pod IP Address') as 'Pod IP', latest(Node) as Node, latest(Controller) as Controller, latest('Controller Kind') as 'Controller Kind', latest('Scheduler Name') as Scheduler by Pod
'Log Source' = 'Kubernetes Event Object Logs' and 'Involved Object Kind' = pod and 'Event Type' = warning | stats distinctcount('Involved Object Name') as count by Reason, 'Involved Object Name'
* | stats distinctcount('Kubernetes Cluster Name') as Clusters
'Log Source' = 'Kubernetes Namespace Object Logs' | stats latest(Status) as Status by Namespace

'Log Source' = 'Kubernetes Pod Object Logs' | link Pod | stats latest('Pod Phase') as Status, latest(Node) as Node, latest(Namespace) as Namespace | fields Count as Records, 'End Time' as 'Last Reported' | highlightgroups color = green [ * | where Status in (running, succeeded) ] as healthy | highlightgroups color = red [ * | where Status in (pending, failed) ] as warning | sort Status
'Log Source' = 'Kubernetes Pod Object Logs' and 'Pod Phase' = pending | stats latest('Pod Phase') as Status by Pod
